Crowdsale.getState (/unique_chucks/6/0xbacd554538c8037545098a36361f54c4e1d0f94e.sol#757-789) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/6/0xbacd554538c8037545098a36361f54c4e1d0f94e.sol#772-789)
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/6/0xbacd554538c8037545098a36361f54c4e1d0f94e.sol#778-789)

Crowdsale.MAX_INVESTMENTS_BEFORE_MULTISIG_CHANGE should be constant (/unique_chucks/6/0xbacd554538c8037545098a36361f54c4e1d0f94e.sol#298-300)
ERC20Basic.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/6/0xbacd554538c8037545098a36361f54c4e1d0f94e.sol#244-250)
